body:
I add a symbolic link and now the cmake configuration has a line:

```
-- Found CUDA: /usr/local/cuda (found suitable version "8.0", minimum required is "7.0")
```

In this directory there is a libnvrtc.

And `LD_LIBRARY_PATH`:

```
➜  build git:(master) echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
/home/atlantix/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/cuda/:/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64:/usr/local/lib:/usr/lib:/lib64:/lib
```

I do not notice any other error. Still, libnvrtc cannot be found by make (ld). Thank you for your advice, but the problem seems to remain.
